comment._content: Not the usual look for a princess.

comment.author: 8110957@N08
comment._content: I've seen pictures of Queen Elizabeth when she was a princess, in an Army uniform fixing a truck, so it isn't that unusual.

comment.author: 61849735@N00
comment._content: Her Wiki entries. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mary,_Princess_Royal_and_Countess_o... She was active in charity drives for WWI soldiers and in the Girl Guides.

comment.author: 31363949@N02
comment._content:
Hi,
This photograph can be dated to June 1923 when Princess Mary became patron of The RAF Nursing Service which changed its name to The Princess Mary RAF Nursing Service, she is wearing RAF uniform but I do not know her rank at the time. The service still exists under that name.

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: The negative has a date on it from early 1927, but it could have been taken earlier.
